author: jim
msg: rotatelogs: add -n number-of-files option to roate through a number
don't truncate the very first file opened (unless the truncate flag is there too)

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: Add comment to clarify the usage of bulk updates with older servers.
(make_update_reporter): Add comment to explain that ra_serf will always use
bulk updates to a server older than 1.8.0.
